term.title: virial coefficients

item.text: Coefficients (B, C, ...) in the virial equation of state for a real gas p V m = R T ( 1 + B V m + C V m where p is the pressure, V m the molar volume, R the gas constant and T the thermodynamic temperature.

item.alttext: p V m = R T ( 1 + B V m + C V m
